channel.title: Notice board | Unimi
channel.description: General notice board of the University of Milan "La Statale"

item.title: University scholarships - first year of a master's degree programme
item.description: University scholarships provisional ranking - Students enrolled in the first year of a master's degree programme.%0A%0A▶️ Learn more on Unimi.it

item.title: Extended weekend opening hours at the BICF Library
item.description: From Saturday, 7 February 2026, the Biology, Chemistry, Physics, and Computer Sciences Library (BICF) will extend its weekend opening hours: Saturday and Sunday, 9-20.%0A%0A▶️ Learn more on Unimi.it

item.title: University Library Service – spring course calendar 2026
item.description: The list of courses offered by the University Library Service in spring 2026 is now online. These courses focus on the use of databases, and are open to the entire University community.%0A%0A▶️ Learn more on Unimi.it

item.title: Master's programmes Admissions A.Y. 2026/2027
item.description: Master's programmes Admissions for Academic Year 2026/2027 are now open.%0ANon-EU students visa applicants are required to apply for admission no later than 30 April 2026.%0A
